description:
Jack is a happy young man. And he's not picky.

The most basic things will put a smile on his face. And one of his favorite things is waking up in the morning with a hard on. Also, a lot of people name their dick, but this guy TALKS to his dick. He talks to it while he strokes it. He makes it happy. Pets it like an animal. Then he makes his dick erupt like a volcano, all over his hands and balls.
title: Jack
